```{r}
subtable <- subset(data_crime, city_name == "Austin")
```

```{r}
subtable %>% 
    toJSON() %>%
    write_lines("/cloud/project/data_exported/data_crime_exported.json")
```

```{r}
geojsonio::geojson_write(subtable, file = "/cloud/project/data_exported/data_crime_exported.geojson")
```

